casebody.data:
Angela Brant BATHELEMY
v.
DOLGENCORP, LLC d/b/a Dollar General 2019-CC-0310 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 29, 2019

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 1ST CITY COURT, PARISH OF ORLEANS

Writ denied. Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons. Genovese, J., would grant this writ for the reasons assigned by Judge Jenkins.

Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

I would grant the writ application filed by Dolgencorp, LLC d/b/a Dollar General for reasons assigned in Judge Jenkins' dissent, which Judge Dysart also joined.
